0.1.1.name: wordpress/space-api
0.1.1.description:
This Plugin provides a Space Api Json file. This plugin is right now pretty much a proof of concept. It doesnt validate anything and is far from being a nice and maintainable source. It should work however.

With Permalinks enabled, you can access the file with http://yourdomain.tld/spaceapi.json, otherwise http://yourdomain.tld/?spaceapi=show
